programme.title: Eggsit Strategy

programme.title: Tank Heaven
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E21, Doug sabotages Carrie's efforts to socialize with her co-workers by doing crass things, such as showing them his chest hair. Amy Stiller guest stars.

programme.title: Lost Vegas

programme.title: Durgan Groupie

programme.title: Furious Gorge
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E03, Carrie makes Doug join a support group for overeaters, but he secretly joins an abusive relationship group where he blames his eating on her.

programme.title: Entertainment Weakly

programme.title: Name Dropper

programme.title: Offtrack...Bedding

programme.title: Cologne Ranger

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance

programme.title: Pour Judgement

programme.title: Gym Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E12, When Doug and Carrie start training with their neighbor (Lou Ferrigno) so Carrie can lose a few pounds, Doug works out a deal that allows him to laze around during exercise time.

programme.title: Gorilla Warfare

programme.title: Hi, School
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E14, When Doug makes a delivery to his former high school, the football coach (Burt Reynolds) treats him like a hero, so Doug begins stopping by more often.

programme.title: Diane's Perfect Date

programme.desc: Cheers, S01E20, Diane proposes marriage to Sam in order to save her mom's inheritance.

programme.title: Affairs of the Heart
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E06, Carla's new love interest could die from too much excitement.

programme.title: Old Flames
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E07, Sam's newly divorced friend tries to come between him and Diane.

programme.title: They Call Me Mayday

programme.title: How Do I Love Thee? Let Me Call You Back
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E10, Sam finally tells Diane he loves her, but his delivery is detrimental.

programme.title: Just Three Friends
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E11, Diane is furious, when she sees that Sam and her old school chum find each other very attractive.

programme.title: Where There's a Will
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E12, Kramer includes Cheers in his will when he receives a dismal prognosis.

programme.title: The Mystery of the Milky Way
programme.desc: Hunting the Edge of Space: The Mystery of the Milky Way, S01E01, The Mystery of the Milky Way chronicles the history of telescopes, from Galileo's refractor to Newton's reflector and beyond. This episode also looks at recent missions, including the Herschel Space Observatory's examination of the Milky Wa

programme.title: The Ever Expanding Universe
programme.desc: Hunting the Edge of Space: The Ever Expanding Universe, S01E02, The Ever-Expanding Universe investigates a battery of high-tech telescopes that are joining the Hubble Space Telescope on its quest to unlock the secrets of our universe, a cosmos almost incomprehensible in its size, age and violence.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

Earthrise: The First Lunar Voyage, 20130101080000 +0000, Interviews with Apollo 8 astronauts, their wives, mission control staff, and journalists give true insider's perspective to the space race of the late 1960's.

Moon Shots: Inside the Lost Apollo Archive, 20160101080000 +0000, The world famous Apollo missions are some of the greatest feats ever accomplished by man. With rare archive footage and unprecedented access to life on board the Apollo spacecrafts, this stunning one-hour special brings scientific history to life.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: The Planet Makers
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Planet Makers, S01E05, From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets.

programme.title: OCEANS IN THE SKY
programme.desc: The New Frontier: OCEANS IN THE SKY, S05E07, Juice and the Europa Clipper are two missions to our Solar System’s largest planet.

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E25, A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2005, A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.
MST3K: Invasion U.S.A., 19940723000000 +0000, A group of barflies must figure out what to do when the Soviets attack the U.S. in Invasion USA (1952)

programme.title: Indestructible Man
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Indestructible Man, S04E09, In Indestructible Man, a violent criminal named Butcher Benson is executed and becomes indestructible when he’s brought back to life.

programme.title: What About Juvenile Delinquency?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E07, A band of no-good punks beat a guy for driving too slow and steal his mechanical pencil, before arriving to pick up their missing member Jamie, the son of the man they've just beaten.

programme.title: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank, S09E22, A weather tech's mind gets trapped in a computer and Pearl establishes her own public television pledge program.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 2)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E18, Advance your career by finishing this enlightening two-part short featuring timeless sales advice.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Attack of the Giant Leeches, S04E06, Hillbillies, holo-clowns, and a giant leech named Patches abound when Joel and the Bots take on this bloodsucking tale from acclaimed producer/director Roger Corman.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Crew
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E09, In part two of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the team discuss the Satellite of Love crew.

programme.title: Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray, S06E24, A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.

programme.title: Wild Rebels
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Wild Rebels, S03E07, A retired race car driver, talked into going undercover by the police, joins a biker gang and must serve as the getaway car driver.
Backlot: MST3K: Santa Versus Satan, S01E33, This episode of Backlot features an interview with some MST3K crew and other experts as they look back at this quirky Rene Cardona-directed movie.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.

programme.title: Mitchell
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell, S05E12, The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.
An Uncommon Grace, 20170212000000 +0000, Grace Connor, a military nurse formerly stationed in Afghanistan, hopes that moving to a farm in rural Ohio will help her recover from the ravages of war.

Little John, 20020505000000 +0000, An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Painted House, 20030427000000 +0000, 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

To Dance with the White Dog, 19931205000000 +0000, An unusual love story in which a strange white dog appears and helps Sam Peek, a Georgia tree farmer, cope with the loss of his wife, Cora. Stars Hume Cronyn and Jessica Tandy. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

After the Glory, 19921129000000 +0000, A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.
J.L. Family Ranch, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Rancher and former sheriff John Landsburg must save his beloved family ranch.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. A blizzard threatens disaster in Middleton.

programme.title: Together We Stand...
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. The winter storm continues to pose a threat to all of Middleton.

programme.title: True Colors
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's enchanting "Good Witch" Cassie receives devastating news.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E07, Beckett begins experimenting with a new treatment that could turn the Wraiths into humans. The team finds a young Wraith girl, who could be Beckett's first patient. Having been raised by a human, the girl is eager, and reckless, to try anything.

programme.title: Conversion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E08, After being injected with Beckett's Wraith treatment, Sheppard's life is in danger as he slowly is transforming into an Iratus bug hybrid. The team rushes to find a cure and reverse the side effects, but in the end it might be up to Sheppard.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E09, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E10, The team are kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E17, Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliance’s secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E20, The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

Stargate SG-1, S02E21, A solar flare sends the SG-1 team back to 1969, where the U.S. military suspects the team of espionage. O'Neill and his team escape with two Woodstock-bound kids, desperate to find the Stargate before they're stuck in the psychedelic past forever.

programme.title: Out Of Mind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E22, O'Neill awakens, seemingly from a 79-year cryogenic sleep, to find that his team is long dead. He soon discovers that it's all a setup and he is actually a prisoner of the Goa'uld, who intend to learn all his secrets…and then destroy him!

programme.title: Into The Fire
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E01, Hathor captures O'Neill and implants him with a destructive Goa'uld symbiote that could eventually kill him. Meanwhile, O'Neill's rescue party is defeated by Hathor's invincible energy barrier and time is running out. Is there a way to save O'Neill?

programme.title: Seth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E02, When SG-1 hunts for a Goa'uld lord living on Earth, they discover this powerful alien in the form of a religious leader with an armed cult following. O'Neill faces off with both government agents and the cult in a clash that may destroy them all.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E03, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) attempts to stop a massive Goa'uld invasion of Earth. But to call off the attack, the Goa'uld lords demand the destruction of the Stargate. O'Neill doesn't fully trust them - but the fate of Earth lies in the balance.

programme.title: Legacy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E04, A mysterious tablet discovered on a distant planet infects anyone who touches it with a hallucinogen. The remarkable stone infects Teal'c and, before long, the entire team except Hammond. Can Hammond (Don S. Davis) stop it and save SG-1 alone?

programme.title: Learning Curve
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E05, As part of an exchange program with the planet Orban, O'Neill travels to Earth with a girl who possesses incredible technical knowledge. But by the time O'Neill discovers the truth behind the child's superior mind…it may be too late for them all.

programme.title: Earthquake Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E09, Dylan asks Toni to marry him. An earthquake rocks the major Los Angeles area, spooking Colin. Donna sees her mother in a photograph of the 1969 Rose Court contestants, but Felice refuses to explain herself.

programme.title: One Wedding and a Funeral
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.title: Offensive Interference
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Coming Out, Getting Out, Going Out

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E14, Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E15, Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E16, Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Father's Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E17, Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E18, Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E19, Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E20, When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E21, Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E22, Hobie is thrilled when the “Johnny Danger Stunt Show" comes to the beach, but Mitch finds Johnny has questionable morals and is worried Hobie may follow his example. Matt is accused of sexual harassment by bad girl lifeguard Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E01, Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again. The explosion of an offshore oil rig endangers Stephanie, Cody, and Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E02, As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E03, Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E04, Caroline tries to stop her sister from making the worst mistake of her life. Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach. Mitch enlists the Beach Boys for a benefit concert to raise money to clean up the pollution.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E05, Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E06, Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina which turns dire when two of the girls get trapped in a flooded cave. Meanwhile, a woman who dies in a car accident bequeaths an odd inheritance to Mitch…

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E07, Hobie's new friend Isaac is an angry kid who will do anything to get his father's attention. His risky behavior is a problem for the lifeguards. Meanwhile, Caroline meets a jockey who has lost the will to race after an accident.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E08, Logan borrows Cody's car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police. Meanwhile, the Baywatch team settles an internal dispute with a paintball war and C.J. takes in an injured sea lion, causing problems with her roommates.
